JumpScale.base.ERRORHANDLER module¶

class JumpScale.base.ERRORHANDLER.ERRORHANDLER[source]¶
static exceptHook(ttype, pythonExceptionObject, tb)[source]¶

every fatal error in jumpscale or by python itself will result in an exception in this function the exception is caught. This routine will create an errorobject & escalate to the infoserver @ttype : is the description of the error @tb : can be a python data object or a Event

JumpScale.base.FSWALKER module¶

class JumpScale.base.FSWALKER.FSWalker(filesystemobject=None)[source]¶
find(root, includeFolders=False, includeLinks=False, pathRegexIncludes={}, pathRegexExcludes={}, followlinks=False, childrenRegexExcludes=['.*/log/.*', '/dev/.*', '/proc/.*'], mdserverclient=None)[source]¶

@return {files:[],dirs:[],links:[],...$othertypes}

getCallBackMatchFunctions(pathRegexIncludes={}, pathRegexExcludes={}, includeFolders=True, includeLinks=True)[source]¶
log(msg)[source]¶
statsAdd(path='', ttype='F', sizeUncompressed=0, sizeCompressed=0, duplicate=False)[source]¶
statsPrint()[source]¶
statsStart()[source]¶
walk(root, callbackFunctions={}, arg=None, callbackMatchFunctions={}, followlinks=False, childrenRegexExcludes=['/dev/.*', '/proc/.*', '/cdrom/.*', '/mnt/.*', '/media/.*', '/run/.*', '/tmp/.*'], pathRegexIncludes={}, pathRegexExcludes={}, mdserverclient=None, stat=False)[source]¶

Walk through filesystem and execute a method per file and dirname if the match function selected the item

Walk through all files and folders and other objects starting at root, recursive by default, calling a given callback with a provided argument and file path for every file & dir we could find.

To match the function use the callbackMatchFunctions which are separate for all types of objects (Dir=D, File=F, Link=L) when it returns True the path will be further processed

>>> def my_print(path,arg):
...     print arg+path
...

>>> def match(path,arg):
...     return True #means will process the object e.g. file which means call my_print in this example
...

>>> self.walk('/foo', my_print,arg="Test: ", callbackMatchFunctions=match)
test: /foo/file1
test: /foo/file2
test: /foo/file3
test: /foo/bar/file4

@param root: Filesystem root to crawl (string)
